The Blue Lagoon is a 1980 American romantic adventure drama film directed by 
Randal Kleiser and filmed on Turtle Island in Fiji. The screenplay by Douglas Day 
Stewart was based on the 1908 novel The Blue Lagoon by Henry De Vere 
Stacpoole. The film stars Brooke Shields and Christopher Atkins. .... The film was
